mapper.select: SELECT emp.id AS employee_id, emp.username AS employee_username, emp.password AS employee_password, emp.name AS employee_name, emp.authority AS employee_authority, emp.created_at AS employee_created_at, emp.updated_at AS employee_updated_at, emp.invalid AS employee_invalid, dep.id AS department_id, dep.name AS department_name FROM employee emp INNER JOIN department dep ON emp.department_id = dep.id WHERE emp.invalid = 0

SELECT emp.id AS employee_id, emp.username AS employee_username, emp.password AS employee_password, emp.name AS employee_name, emp.department_id AS employee_department_id, emp.authority AS employee_authority, emp.created_at AS employee_created_at, emp.updated_at AS employee_updated_at, emp.invalid AS employee_invalid, dep.id AS department_id, dep.name AS department_name FROM employee emp INNER JOIN department dep ON emp.department_id = dep.id WHERE emp.username = #{username} AND emp.invalid = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee ( username, password, name, department_id ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{department.id} )
